005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Locale;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Based on the XPath 3.1 <a href=
025 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-upper-case">fn:upper-case</a>
026 * functions.
027 */
028public final class FnUpperCase {
029  private static final String NAME = "upper-case";
030
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextIndependent()
037      .focusIndependent()
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("arg")
040          .type(IStringItem.type())
041          .zeroOrOne()
042          .build())
043      .returnType(IStringItem.type())
044      .returnOne()
045      .functionHandler(FnUpperCase::executeOneArg)
046      .build();
047
048  private FnUpperCase() {
049    // disable construction
050  }
051
052  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
053  @NonNull
054  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeOneArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
055      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext, IItem focus) {
056
057    // From the XPath 3.1 specification:
058    // If the value of $arg is the empty sequence, the zero-length string is
059    // returned.
060    return ISequence.of(arguments.get(0).isEmpty()
061        ? IStringItem.valueOf("")
062        : fnUpperCase(FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.notNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)))));
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * An implementation of <a href=
067   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-upper-case">fn:upper-case</a>.
068   *
069   * @param arg
070   *          the string to be converted to lower case
071   * @return the resulting string in upper case
072   */
073  @NonNull
074  public static IStringItem fnUpperCase(@NonNull IStringItem arg) {
075    return IStringItem.valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(arg.asString().toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT)));
076  }
077}
